\begin{Thm} \label {thm:0}
For every function $f_0\in C^\infty(M)$ whose all critical points are of the $A_\mu$-types, $\mu\in\NN$, there exist smooth manifolds $\cB$ and $\cE$ and surjective submer\-sions 
$k:\cF\to\cB$, 
$\varkappa:M\times\cF\to\cE$, 
$\pi:\cE\to\cB$,
$\eps:\cE\to\RR$ such that
the diagram

\begin{Thm} \label {thm:0}
For every function $f_0\in C^\infty(M)$ whose all critical points are of the $A_\mu$-types, $\mu\in\NN$, there exist smooth manifolds $\cB$ and $\cE$ and surjective submer\-sions 
$k:\cF\to\cB$, 
$\varkappa:M\times\cF\to\cE$, 
$\pi:\cE\to\cB$,
$\eps:\cE\to\RR$ such that
the diagram
